awd_titl_txt: FASEB Summer Research Conference:  Plant Molecular Genetics Copper Mountain, Colorado, August 9-14, 1992.
awd_abstract_narration: The Federation of the American Sociey for Experimental Biology                  will host a conference on Plant Molecular Genetics at Copper                    Mountain, Colorado, on August 9-14, 1992.  Overall, the objective               of the conference is to bring together genetic approaches to                    studies of plant development, hormone action, transcriptional                   regulation, biochemical regulation, and disease resistance.                     %%%                                                                             It is timely and useful to bring together plant scientists at a                 conference where the key emphasis is on the use of genetic analysis             in the study of plant biology.
org_div_long_name: Division of Molecular and Cellular Biosciences
